name: Main Wall
_source: s;Simon;You were right, Luther. We're in.
s;Luther;Aye, but the battle's just begun.
s;Luther;The bandits have likely been alerted to our presense.{w}{br}We should tread carefully and use the terrain to our advantage.
s;Simon;Right.{w}{br}And it looks like their leader is deeper in the cave.
s;Simon;If we can stop him, we can probably get the rest of them to retreat.
s;Luther;Just be careful, milord.{w}{br}The bandit leaders are known for their cruelty and cunning.
